page.title: 05 YEW TREE FARM,NEWTON.
page.content: Yew Tree Farm,Newton is run by Mr and Mrs Cullimore. The position of the farm,ten feet above sea level,and close to the river Severn,forces the farmer to produce beef,milk and lamb.He has 130 cows and a few of them are for meat.He has 160 ewes and a ram,all used for producing lamb and mutton. The farm covers an area of 300 acres and only 60 acres are used for arable farming. The only recent changes were caused by EEC quotas which made the farmer cut down on cows. The only helpers on the farm are himself,his wife,a full time and a part time employee.Four workers in all.His farm is one of 5 tenant farms and he gets his heavy machinery on contract,but has four tractors,3 normal ones and one known as a "foreloader".This allows the farmer to attach machinery to the front of it,
